Class Vector3f

  • java.lang.Object
    • Vector3f

  •  class Vector3f
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for Colour: "package javax.vecmath does not exist" (NXJ) so we write our own private class. Only does stuff that's useful for Colour.
    Author:
    Neil
